metadata.title: CVE-2014-8762 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The ajax_mediadiff function in DokuWiki before 2014-05-05a allows remoteattackers to access arbitrary images via a crafted namespace in the nsparameter.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
